Some patient receive 5 ml normal saline . The patient randomly assign five group . For pretreatment patient administer 5 ml normal saline Group I ( Control ) ; acetaminophen 50mg Group II , acetaminophen 25 mg Group III , lidocaine 20 mg Group IV lidocaine 40mg Group V , dilute 5 mL saline IV .
